name: Tier 3 Spell Fumbles (Levels 9-12)
description: Fumble effects for spell attacks at Tier 3 (Levels 9-12). Effects are more severe for experienced adventurers.

results.text: Nothing Special - Your spell fizzles harmlessly with no additional penalty.
Severe Backlash - The spell's energy rebounds violently. Take 2d8 force damage.
Magic Burnout - Your magic fails completely. You cannot cast spells for 1 minute.
Total Sensory Overload - You are blinded, deafened, and stunned until the end of your next turn.
Multiple Slot Burn - The failed casting burns out multiple spell slots. Lose 1d4 spell slots.
Spell Fully Rebounds - Your spell affects you at full power. Take the spell's full damage and effects on yourself.
Fatigued - The failed spell drains you completely. You have disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks for 1 minute.
Wild Magic Explosion - A wild magic explosion occurs centered on you. All creatures within 20 feet must make DC 15 Dex save or take 3d6 force damage.
